title: The Gates tremble
author: VD
content_html:
My dear atheists, I know you’re very excited about how well “The God Delusion” and “God is Not Great” are selling and all, but you’re not winning. Really, you’re not.

It’s good to see our African brothers and sisters are willing to take the torch from a dying West. Christianity cannot be proven false until the Gates of Hell prevail.
